173a3(nyi khri): bar bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
173a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'a byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
173a5(nyi khri): ba nyid du 'brung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ma/ rnam pa
173a6(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la 'di skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de
173a7(nyi khri): khyod nyid la dri yi/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzham nig yin snyam 'am/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
173a8(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan yin snyom 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 
173b1(nyi khri): de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzham zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzham nig yin snyam 'am/ gzugs kyang gzhan la
173b2(nyi khri): sgyu ma yang gzham zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / ches kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzham nig yin snyam 'am/ mig rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
173b3(nyi khri): snyim 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan le/ sbrum yang gan
173b4(nyi khri): zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus de rag pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi
173b5(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
173b6(nyi khri): yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
173b7(nyi khri): dang / yid kyi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzham nig yin snyam 'am/ gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
173b8(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzham zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan
174a1(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'ber nga ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagaso/ 
174a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
174a3(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu me/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags
174a4(nyi khri): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma la/ 
174a5(nyi khri): te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan la/ ngas gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gnan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzug so// 
174a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang sa pa chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sbyar nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa
174a7(nyi khri): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi go rnam par shes pa'i// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna
174a8(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
174b1(nyi khri): yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lag
174b2(nyi khri): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
174b3(nyi khri): pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// 
174b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gan na ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi
174b5(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cher ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'a dus te rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
174b6(nyi khri): ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
174b7(nyi khri): tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
174b8(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
175a1(nyi khri): ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnams so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gnam ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs
175a2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnam so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub nyid
175a3(nyi khri): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yang dam/ gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das de nim
175a4(nyi khri): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de dza sum du sems/ sbru ma kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par bang ba yeng ngam/ gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
175a5(nyi khri): ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de dza snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa meng cing rnam par byang ba
175a6(nyi khri): med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
175a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la/ 'od snga ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes
175a8(nyi khri): pa dang / brda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga ji snyam du sems/ 
175b1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / brda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha srang tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas chen mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba dmigs par 'gyur ras/ gsol pa/ bcom
175b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda' med pa dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming
175b3(nyi khri): du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang
175b4(nyi khri): kun nas nyen rengs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
175b5(nyi khri): nyid theb par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'ber de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po shes rab kyi
175b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/ shes
175b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i bslab pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
175b8(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol
176a1(nyi khri): du phyin pa la bslangs shing / rnam pa thams cad pakhan pa nyid du 'thung bar 'gyur ram/ gsel ba bcom ldan 'das de mi 'gyur// de ci'i slang du nam/ bcom ldam
176a2(nyi khri): de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang ba'i na nger dmigs su ma pa se// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de ji snyam du sems
176a3(nyi khri): rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das de na mi 'gyur// de tsa
176a4(nyi khri): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ rmi lam ni dngos be ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin / dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang ba ning de ni dmi gsum mchi se// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
176a5(nyi khri): pa/ rab 'byer de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / swabarnyan lnga bu dang / mig yer lnga bu dang / chu zla lnga bu dang / mig rgyu lnga bdung / sprul pa lnga bu'i phung po lnga pa dag she
176a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lda
176a7(nyi khri): sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgra brnyan ni dngos pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ tshig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ muH ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig rgyu ni dngos pas
176a8(nyi khri): mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigasu ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga ni 'di ltar gzugs
176b1(nyi khri): ni rmi lam lnga du/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes na rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lnga bu/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// nga ni phung po lnga'o// 
176b2(nyi khri): rab 'byer gzugs ni sgyum lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyum lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug/ de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byo
176b3(nyi khri): gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ cher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug/ da ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'aper gzug
176b4(nyi khri): ni mig yod lnga bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni mgo yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa nga ni dbang po drug/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ 
176b5(nyi khri): 'byor gzugs ni chu rdul bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dpa 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni murdza lA buste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po glo/ don phung po lnga'o/ 
176b6(nyi khri): rab 'byer gzugs na mig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bang dang / rnam par shes pa ni mig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug/ de ni phung po lnga'o// rab
176b7(nyi khri): 'byor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug/ nga ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni
176b8(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
177a1(nyi khri): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/ bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs shing dang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags drang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
177a2(nyi khri): phal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bar shes gnyen gyis lag tu 'ang ma
177a3(nyi khri): 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing dngang ba dang skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngang mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha
177a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'a/ ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'ber 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
177a5(nyi khri): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rdeg ste/ de mi dmigs/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
177a6(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmig so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dada' phem
177a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
177a8(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtogs ste de mi dmig so// tshor
177b1(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs ni zhes bya bar rtog ste/ 
177b2(nyi khri): de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni zhes bya bar rtog sde de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya ba
177b3(nyi khri): rtog ste/ de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mtshan
177b4(nyi khri): ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du sa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam por shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
177b5(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs smon pa mang ces bya bar rtog ste/ mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste ma
177b6(nyi khri): dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog steng mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
177b7(nyi khri): shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog sdeng mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs dbes zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du she
177b8(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas
178a1(nyi khri): pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
178a2(nyi khri): bas/ gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed nga mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bad dang / rnam par shes
178a3(nyi khri): pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rdzogs par byed de/ de mi dmig so// tsher
178a4(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rdzogs par byed da ngo mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
178a5(nyi khri): gzugs bdag mang ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rdzogs par byed de nge
178a6(nyi khri): dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmig so// tshar ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
178a7(nyi khri): ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba'i gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
178a8(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi ngoms
178b1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigasaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas gzugs
178b2(nyi khri): smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par bde/ de mi dmig so// rnam pa
178b3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
178b4(nyi khri): shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed/ deng mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lnga na pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben po'o rnam par rtogs
178b5(nyi khri): par byed de de mi dmigs// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par gus par byed de de mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor 'dzi na byang chub sa
178b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can
178b7(nyi khri): thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
178b8(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba meng pa dang / 
179a1(nyi khri): dbem zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med
179a2(nyi khri): ba dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba meng pa dang / dben zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches bstan te snyam// rab 'bor 'di ni byang chub sed
179a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ nga yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur// rab 'byor gzhan yong byang chub sems
179a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbred pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs yang mi rtog pa'i rnam par
179a5(nyi khri): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
179a6(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la bang pa de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bdo// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang
179a7(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa mang ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed par
179a8(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag meng ba dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / 
179b1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa mang po dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
179b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ nga yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang
179b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi
179b4(nyi khri): ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa 'i rnam pa dang / smin pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed
179b5(nyi khri): pa dang / bzod pa dang / mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma
179b6(nyi khri): 'jigs shing mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
179b7(nyi khri): pa yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
179b8(nyi khri): tshul gyis rab tu rtog/ gzugs sdug bsngal ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon
180a1(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rdeg ge/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag
180a2(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / spen pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
180a3(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'ang na// 
180a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ nga yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ 'chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
180a5(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pas yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag
180a6(nyi khri): ces bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i ches ngo ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi lo skabs mi 'byed pa
180a7(nyi khri): dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa mang ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
180a8(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / de be ma zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi b.lel su 'gyur ba ba'am
180b1(nyi khri): gyi glo skabs mi 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya
180b2(nyi khri): ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dab ma zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos
180b3(nyi khri): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba ma yin pa/ byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzham zhig gi go skabs mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bas
180b4(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod paso byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po nga mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyuraro// bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor gzhan
180b5(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam po 'di ltar/ 
180b6(nyi khri): rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam/ 
180b7(nyi khri): par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// migo stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin
180b8(nyi khri): gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid / 
181a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang yang ngo // gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs snod pa ma yin gyis/ gagyur shing bang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'jug so// sgra dang / dring / 
181a2(nyi khri): ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos// mgri rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig rnam par shes pa stong
181a3(nyi khri): pa ma yin gyi/ mig rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
181a4(nyi khri): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yi da kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
181a5(nyi khri): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dun te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ ga gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
181a6(nyi khri): kyang mig 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus ta ram pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te nges pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi
181a7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi
181a8(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te/ 
181b1(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
181b2(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
181b3(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang steng pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// 
181b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
181b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// rab 'ber 'di ni byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'ber 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
181b6(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'od thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngang / skrag par
181b7(nyi khri): mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 
181b8(nyi khri): mi 'jigs/ mi dang ngo // skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i tha shes
182a1(nyi khri): gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces pa bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches spen cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa rdegs par nyan
182a2(nyi khri): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byeng dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
182a3(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems
182a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i ba shes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes pa
182a5(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
182a6(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag mad ces pa bar nga mi
182a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni zhes pa
182a8(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du 'ashes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes po sdo
182b1(nyi khri): zhes pa bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches spen pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
182b2(nyi khri): pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs smin pa med ces pa bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
182b3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces pa ba de ni ma rigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzug so sngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
182b4(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
182b5(nyi khri): gyis chos ston pa dang / cher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bong dang / rnam par shes pa dben nas bya bar de mi dmig sa pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
182b6(nyi khri): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
182b7(nyi khri): bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshas gnyen ni gang de la mig mo rtag ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang
182b8(nyi khri): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
183a1(nyi khri): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sdug bsngal zhes pa bar nge mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / mig bdag med ces pa bar de mi dmigs pa
183a2(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / mig ni zhes pa bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
183a3(nyi khri): lus dang / yid ni zhes pa bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig steng zhes pa dar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lha dang / lus dang / 
183a4(nyi khri): yid stong zhes bya bar de mi ngomigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
183a5(nyi khri): dang yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi/ sa chos ston pa dang / mig smon pa med ces bya bar de ming migs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang
183a6(nyi khri): lce dang / lus dang / yid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig sngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
183a7(nyi khri): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par 'du ba ba mang ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig dben zhes bya bar de mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
183a8(nyi khri): ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dban zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
183b1(nyi khri): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug go// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la
183b2(nyi khri): gzugs mi rtag ces pa bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
183b3(nyi khri): sar yongs su sngor mo 'jug pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / re dang / reg dang / chos mo rtag ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa zang
183b4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa dang / gzug das sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
183b5(nyi khri): ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sa ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
183b6(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos bdag med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes pa bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
183b7(nyi khri): gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / re dang / reg dang / chos zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sto
183b8(nyi khri): pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma mang ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stom
184a1(nyi khri): pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / re dang / reg dang / ches mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / gzugs smon pa med ces pa bar de mi dmigs
184a2(nyi khri): ba'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / re dang / reg dang / chos smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces pa bar nge
184a3(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces pa bar de mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / gzugs dben nas bya bar nge ma
184a4(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dben zhes bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
184a5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug go// rab 'bor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
184a6(nyi khri): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
184a7(nyi khri): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang
184a8(nyi khri): yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
184b1(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mo 'jug pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes
184b2(nyi khri): pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / mig rnam par shes pa bdag med
184b3(nyi khri): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par/ 
184b4(nyi khri): shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos spen pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni zhes bya bar nga ming mi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
184b5(nyi khri): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes/ bzhi zhes bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig
184b6(nyi khri): gi rnam par shes pa steng zhes bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
184b7(nyi khri): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa steng zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i
184b8(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
185a1(nyi khri): gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes
185a2(nyi khri): ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig rnam par shes pa mngon
185a3(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la
185a4(nyi khri): yid kyi rnam par shes po mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
185a5(nyi khri): cing / rna ba'i ma par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam pas pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya
185a6(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jon
185a7(nyi khri): pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba
185a8(nyi khri): gnyen ni gang de lo migi 'dus te rig pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
185b1(nyi khri): kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi/ 
185b2(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
185b3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i
185b4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / dkyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces
185b5(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid
185b6(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / migo 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / 
185b7(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa stong/ 
185b8(nyi khri): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
186a1(nyi khri): reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
186a2(nyi khri): ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg po dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te res pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
186a3(nyi khri): ston pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi
186a4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba de mi
186a5(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
186a6(nyi khri): 'dus te rag pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i
186a7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
186a8(nyi khri): dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
186b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces pa bar de mi darigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
186b2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
186b3(nyi khri): ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
186b4(nyi khri): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te
186b5(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la sa byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
186b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
186b7(nyi khri): gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i dus te reg pa
186b8(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi
187a1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ga mi zhes bya bar de mi dmams pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la
187a2(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
187a3(nyi khri): ci'i tshor ba ni zhes bya bar ngami dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bstong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
187a4(nyi khri): zung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las thung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te
187a5(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher
187a6(nyi khri): ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba
187a7(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te chen
187a8(nyi khri): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lha'i 'dus
187b1(nyi khri): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
187b2(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
187b3(nyi khri): ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de ma
187b4(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshochor
187b5(nyi khri): ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce 'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
187b6(nyi khri): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
187b7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug go// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen ni/ gdang la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag
187b8(nyi khri): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa
188a1(nyi khri): med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dbem zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom/ 
188a2(nyi khri): ba'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtegs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor ma
188a3(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / i zhes bya ba
188a4(nyi khri): dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
188a5(nyi khri): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa'i phyi rang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
188a6(nyi khri): du sgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
188a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes/ 
188a8(nyi khri): par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor
188b1(nyi khri): gros gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'as ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jams
188b2(nyi khri): shing stang la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ @
188b3(nyi khri): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom
188b4(nyi khri): zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sem sa su byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing de dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sem su
188b5(nyi khri): byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmig sa te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ 
188b6(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sem su byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
188b7(nyi khri): bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
188b8(nyi khri): mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
189a1(nyi khri): / gargyas su me pa shes bya ba mi 'byed/ baphrul gyi spong ba sa bya ba mi byer / brgyal khyim rnyeng pa me byab tshang la byed/ 
189a2(nyi khri): ngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kri bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed / rnam pas shes pa 'i stong
189a3(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yong la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nong stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yod la byed cing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nong stong
189a4(nyi khri): pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang migs phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po meng pa'i ngo be nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid des
189a5(nyi khri): gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// mig nang stong pa zhes bya b.rayid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po mad
189a6(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yod dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ 
189a7(nyi khri): byi nang stong po nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmogs la steng po nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzungs
189b1(nyi khri): pho stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / 
189b2(nyi khri): chos nang stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ches phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ches dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed
189b3(nyi khri): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang steng pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigaso/ phyi nang stong po nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong / 
189b4(nyi khri): pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// mig gi rnam pa shes pa nang stong pa zhes bro bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam dbar shes pa phyi steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam
189b5(nyi khri): par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi/ rnam par shes pa dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
189b6(nyi khri): sna'i rnam par ro shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par ro shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes
189b7(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs
189b8(nyi khri): po'i tshul gyis nong stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phye stong pa nyid de yong dmigs phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
190a1(nyi khri): de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rig gi 'dus te dag pa pi steng pa zhes pa bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa
190a2(nyi khri): phyi nang steng pa zhes bya bar yid la bad / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te rag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang
190a3(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te rig pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yod kyi 'dus te reg pa po steng pa zhes pa bar yid la bang / yid kyi 'dus de dag pa phyi nang sted pa zhes pa ngar yid la byed/ 
190a4(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang snying pa nyid de yang dmigs/ pi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ pi nang sbeng pa
190a5(nyi khri): nyid de yang ngongogs/ dngos po med pa'i ngag nyid steng pa nyid du/ bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rnam semasu byeda'o// mi ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cher ba nang sna
190a6(nyi khri): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mi gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byeng / mig 'dus
190a7(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna bo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lha'i 'dus te reg
190a8(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
190b1(nyi khri): dza steng pa zhes bya bar ying la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ phyi nang sbeng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po meng pa'i ngo pe tshang steng pa nyid kyi ba
190b2(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang steng pa nyid de yang dmigs/ pi steng pa nyid de yang darigs/ phyi nang steng pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar de yang
190b3(nyi khri): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed// sa'i khams nang steng pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byad / sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces
190b4(nyi khri): ba bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang
190b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i khams nang sbeng pa nyid ces bya bar yid labyed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams po steng pa nyid ces bya ba yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pi nang stong pa nyid ce
190b6(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa nang steng pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi steng pa nyid ces bya bar
190b7(nyi khri): yid la byed/ ma rig pa pi nang steng pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang
190b8(nyi khri): gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rma shi phyi stong pa nyid
191a1(nyi khri): ce bapar yi 'a byed/  sa sdong pa'i nges papar ri la nga/ dag pas pa ma pa' 'a bdang rje pa nyid kyi bar mes pa pa mi khyer cing / dmams pa tshul
191a2(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ pho nang sdang pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos pa mang ba'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid de yang dmigs la/ steng pa nyid du dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed // 
191a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba mang par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
191a4(nyi khri): sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gos kyang rlom semasu byed de// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
191a5(nyi khri): rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / 
191a6(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs meng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang
191a7(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gsus kyi sde rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pacan
191a8(nyi khri): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom sde/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
191b1(nyi khri): 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed de// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas mi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
191b2(nyi khri): phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grags pos yongs su zin cing / 
191b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thes na/ 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa'i grogs pa'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
191b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i glegs po mi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'dren
191b5(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 
191b6(nyi khri): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni ches ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyi/ 'di la bslab par bya ba mi 'cha'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzobs pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// 
191b7(nyi khri): bzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o// zhes zer ba 'din/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
191b8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grags por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i glegs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig tocan sangs rgyas kyi chabyang du byal
192a1(nyi khri): pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las bzlog cing mes pa meng par byed de// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
192a2(nyi khri): bsgom pas ni/ khyed la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas ni khang la ci zhig pa/ brjen 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas ni kheng la ci zhig pa/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
192a3(nyi khri): pas ni khyed la ci zhig pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas ni khed la ci zhig pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas na khyed la ci zhig pa/ zhes zer ba 'ang zhes bdud kyi las mi sten/ bdud kyi
192a4(nyi khri): nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'ber byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i glegs par rig par bya'o// rab 'ber gas na yang bdud sdig te can ngag sangs rgyas kyi cha bang du byas shing / nga
192a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ na thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / cheng du brjod pa
192a6(nyi khri): dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rdegs pa brjod pa dang / bstan la bab pa bstan pa dag sten to// 'grel to// 
192a7(nyi khri): rnam par 'byed de// gsal bar byed do yongs su sten to// zhes bdud kyi las rnams 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi snun pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdobag pa'i grags por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
192a8(nyi khri): gnan yang bdud drug po sa nangs songs rgyas kyi byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i dru du phyin te/ 'di brang du rigs kyi bu khyod la nubang chu gyi sems sung za kyang de/ 
192b1(nyi khri): kheng ni par mi ldeg pa yang ma yin no// khyed kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ngang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi ston pa ni rab
192b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i glegs par rig par ba'o// rab 'bar gzhan yang bdud sdig te can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha bang du byas shing ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin
192b3(nyi khri): 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam/ bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gam/ bdag gis steng ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam/ bdag gis steng
192b4(nyi khri): sgra dang / dri dang / re dang / reg dang / ches ni bdag ga ma bdag gis sto // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam pa
192b5(nyi khri): shes pa dang / lce'i rnam ya ma thas du tsha gas pa tsa mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dag
192b6(nyi khri): gam/ bdag gis steng // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
192b7(nyi khri): dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam/ bdag gis steng ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gas/ bdag gis steng ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
192b8(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam/ bdag gis steng ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi
193a1(nyi khri): bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis steng // sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis steng na/ bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
193a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas te/ yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi sten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i glegs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig
193a3(nyi khri): to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems papa
193a4(nyi khri): dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas zhe sa bya ba yang med/ byang chub sems dpal zhes pa pa yang med/ nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med de/ lde dang / nub dang / byang ba
193a5(nyi khri): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 1
193a6(nyi khri): thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi sten pa 'di ma
193a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
193a8(nyi khri): drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas 'doms pa dang / rjesu ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las
193b1(nyi khri): ngag mi smra mi spen pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i glegs por rig par ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang sdeb dben gyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub
193b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba las zlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / 
193b3(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / steng
193b4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su snyoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig/ tha
193b5(nyi khri): na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis kheng la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grags
193b6(nyi khri): por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig te can dag pa dang ma'i cha bad du bya zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
193b7(nyi khri): chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas/ khyed la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rkang lag dang / mgo gcod pa tshang med pa/ zhen mongs par 'gyur gyi/ ga
193b8(nyi khri): la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya
194a1(nyi khri): yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ldan pa 'ang ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grags par rig par bya'o// 
194a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dag gleng gi cha bang du bya zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / gzugs
194a3(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
194a4(nyi khri): dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med par
194a5(nyi khri): zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes pa bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mi rtag
194a6(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / steng ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
194a7(nyi khri): chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 
194a8(nyi khri): mngon pa ba du bya ba med pa dang / dbe ma zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan
194b1(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang
194b2(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / steng pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
194b3(nyi khri): mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben
194b4(nyi khri): zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi
194b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
194b6(nyi khri): med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan
194b7(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa de 'gas / ya du ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te rag pa dang / lus
194b8(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te rag pa mi rtag ces bro ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa meng pa dang / mngon
195a1(nyi khri): par 'du ba ba med pa dang / dben zhes pa bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / ni gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mo rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 
195a2(nyi khri): bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / snang pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du ba ba med pa dang / dbem zhes pa bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis che ston pa dang / rna ba'i
195a3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te
195a4(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma meng ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba meng pa dang / dbenan
195a5(nyi khri): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dran pa nye/ bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / steng pa dang
195a6(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par du bya ba med pa dang / dbam nas pa bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag
195a7(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dbar zhes bya bar dmigs
195a8(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i glegs por rig par bya'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
195b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grags par rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u bdun pa'o// 
195b2(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol
195b3(nyi khri): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don no tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma skyes la
195b4(nyi khri): sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'ber byang chub la yang tshig med/ sems can lo yang tshig med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
195b5(nyi khri): dper na na mkha' la bya'i rjes meng ngo // rab 'byer de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mang// rab 'ber 'di ltaste dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin
195b6(nyi khri): dubyang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'bor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas mdo// rab 'byor nga bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mang de// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ma/ 
195b7(nyi khri): mig sgyu ma la gnas mdo// rab 'byor nga bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'ber 'di lta ste dper na/ chu zla dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / 
195b8(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mang ngo // rab 'byor 'ang lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas mdo// rab 'byor de bzhin
196a1(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mang de// rang 'byer 'di lnga sde dper ma/ de bzhin nyid la gnas med de// ma ner pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang
196a2(nyi khri): ches nyid dang / ches kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / ches sgren meng pa nyid la gnas meng ngo // rab 'byor nga bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig 'di den rung // rab 'byor 'di lta sde dpang
196a3(nyi khri): na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas mdo// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med de// rab 'ber de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shA
196a4(nyi khri): bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med// rab 'ber 'di lnga ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la gnas mang ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
196a5(nyi khri): yid la gnas med// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den med de/ 
196a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / re dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med de// rab 'bar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
196a7(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rna ba'i rnam par
196a8(nyi khri): shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas mdo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
196b1(nyi khri): rapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa rol du phyi pa la skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi den meng de// rab byer 'di lnga sde daderam/ smra ba'i skyes bub mig go dus reg pa la gas med do// 
196b2(nyi khri): ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lnga'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa li gnas med de// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
