196b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med de// rab 'byer 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
196b4(nyi khri): gnas mdo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te ra ga po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
196b5(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ga nas mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i bya
196b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med// rab 'ber 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i ma rig pa la gnas med de// 'du bang dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / 
196b7(nyi khri): reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
196b8(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi der mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshig gi don mang ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol
197a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes lab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
197a2(nyi khri): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don meng ngo // / dam de bcu gsum
197a3(nyi khri): ba/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don meng ngo // phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don mdo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
197a4(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshig gi don medo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mdo/ 
197a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar gan sa pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu' phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams
197a6(nyi khri): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
197a7(nyi khri): bar 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
197a8(nyi khri): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
197b1(nyi khri): bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'byor 'a
197b2(nyi khri): lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas medo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de meng ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
197b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par
197b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed pa ro// rnam par shes pa la gnas me // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
197b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don me ngango // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
197b6(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mig la gnas mdo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ mig meng ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
197b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don medo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
197b8(nyi khri): dang / yid la gnas med // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid nge med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
198a1(nyi khri): / dpa'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ de bzhin dushegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas medo// de tse'i phyi bzhen/ 
198a2(nyi khri): gzugs de meng ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor ngade bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'a'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'ber 'di lta ste dper na/ 
198a3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de meng pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byorade
198a4(nyi khri): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
198a5(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas meng ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin
198a6(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don medo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
198a7(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas mdo// de
198a8(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mngo/ 
198b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas medo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab
198b2(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
198b3(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas medo// de ci'i
198b4(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de meng pa'i phyir te/ rab 'a byer de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
198b5(nyi khri): gi don mdo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin g.ye/ gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas medo// de
198b6(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
198b7(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don meng ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te
198b8(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas medo// de ci'i phyir/ 
199a1(nyi khri): zhen/ yid kyi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir te/ rab khyer de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi zil tu bya
199a2(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas med do// de
199a3(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de meng pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mang de/ 
199a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / 
199a5(nyi khri): skye mchod drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / dwe/ da pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rba shi la gnas medo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shing med pa'i
199a6(nyi khri): phyir te/ rab 'aper de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste depe ra na/ de
199a7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas mang ngo // de ci'i phar zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin po de med pa'i phyir te/ rab
199a8(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'byer 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
199b1(nyi khri): padagra bsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / badren 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
199b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med// nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de meng pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byer nga bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
199b3(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mdo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas medo// de ci'i phyir
199b4(nyi khri): zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid da med pa'i pir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den med de/ 
199b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas medo// de ci'i phyir
199b6(nyi khri): zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da med pa'i phar te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
199b7(nyi khri): mdo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang
199b8(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshang med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa
200a1(nyi khri): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sto
200a2(nyi khri): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir
200a3(nyi khri): te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi
200a4(nyi khri): dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do// 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus mo byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
200a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshunagi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas medo// 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
200a6(nyi khri): nu nyon mongs pa med dadang / rnam por byed ba med pa dang / mngon par du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba mang pa dang / dmigs pa med pa la gnas med do// rab 'byong de bzhin du byang chub sems pas
200a7(nyi khri): sems dpa chen po shes sa kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ses tsha ches gdod med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang 'i skye bam mchis pa la gnas pa ma mchom/ rang gis/ 
200a8(nyi khri): ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'dubagyi ba ma mchis pa dang / 'thung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang gi mi rigs pa la sas
200b1(nyi khri): ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas medo// gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs
200b2(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba mang ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba med pa dang / gzugs ma dmigs pa la gnas med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna
200b3(nyi khri): par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas mad do// rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba med pa/ rnam par shes
200b4(nyi khri): ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'byung nga ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa la ga/ denas medo// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel pa
200b5(nyi khri): 'byung ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gal pa na/  pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
200b6(nyi khri): med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas mdo// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi ba ra dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / 
200b7(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa
200b8(nyi khri): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 
201a1(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas medo// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams 'gal
201a2(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par bang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba meng pa dang / 'byung ba meng pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas medo// rab 'ber de bzhin du byang chub sems
201a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mang ngo // rab 'byer 'di lta ste dper na gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas mdo// tshor ba
201a4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas mdo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
201a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ dper na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'thung ba shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas me / 
201a6(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don meng ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
201a7(nyi khri): ma'i gnas medo// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa
201a8(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / cheng mang pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
201b1(nyi khri): dang steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 
201b2(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / se so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas mdo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
201b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mdo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir/ bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med de// sems can dang / 
201b4(nyi khri): srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gse ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang za ga dang shed can dang / sheng bdag dang / byed pa po dang // tshor mo dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par
201b5(nyi khri): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// 
201b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i cha/ mun pa'i gnas mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
201b7(nyi khri): spyod po'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i mi 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do// rab 'byor nga bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
201b8(nyi khri): songs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sal
202a1(nyi khri): rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med// rab 'ber de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
202a2(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas med// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
202a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mad do// rab 'bar 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
202a4(nyi khri): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas mang ngo // rab 'bor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
202a5(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med de// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol pa la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas
202a6(nyi khri): med do// rab 'ber de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mdo// rab 'bor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
202a7(nyi khri): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par ma grel ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i gnas medo// rab 'brer de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
202a8(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mdo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do// rab 'ber de bzhin du byung
202b1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den mang// rab 'byer 'di lta ste dper ma/ gza' dang skar ma dang / nor bu rin po cha dang gleg gi 'ang la gnas med de/ 
202b2(nyi khri): rang 'dir de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'angal
202b3(nyi khri): gnas mang de// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs
202b4(nyi khri): chen dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas mang ngo po/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den
202b5(nyi khri): med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
202b6(nyi khri): kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don medado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar
202b7(nyi khri): byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshig don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa
202b8(nyi khri): thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi meng pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// 
203a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
203a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos ni/ ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
203a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa
203a4(nyi khri): med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mongs ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byer de dag ni chos thams cad ces
203a5(nyi khri): bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang tsha sa de dag thams cad kyang med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes par bya ba
203a6(nyi khri): yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/ 
203a7(nyi khri): phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims la
203a8(nyi khri): byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di
203b1(nyi khri): ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bru can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par brnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes pang / 
203b2(nyi khri): rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 
203b3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rje su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / chos rjesu dran pa dang / ngag 'dun rje su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rje su dran pa dang / gtong ba rje su dran
203b4(nyi khri): ba dang / lha rje su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rje su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rje su dran pa dang / skye brjesu dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos ngas
203b5(nyi khri): ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ ka' stsal pa/ mi dag pa bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab
203b6(nyi khri): 'byor/ sog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i ches mi dge ba'o// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags
203b7(nyi khri): sems dang / gnod sems dang / leg par blta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chag pa dang / tshig pa dang / tshor ba dang / phra dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa
203b8(nyi khri): nga rgyal ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lungs
204a1(nyi khri): // dgapal nga na par//  kyil ma sa'agyu pa tu ga
204a2(nyi khri): los yo lan kye 'di su su mas smin pam su ga sde ra myo jam lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de ngas ni lung du ma bstan pa'i cho su shes par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos
204a3(nyi khri): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan ba'i dang / 
204a4(nyi khri): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa po dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa'i ches gang ji snyed pa
204a5(nyi khri): de dag ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ @ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las
204a6(nyi khri): 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
204a7(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang / 
204a8(nyi khri): bo dang / yongs su shes par rtongs pa'i dang po dang / rtob pa dang bcam/ pyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge lon dang / rtog pa med pa la dbyed pa'i ngong po lan dang / rtob pa med cing myong ba med
204b1(nyi khri): ting 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di/ 
204b2(nyi khri): ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas pha rol gyi gzugs mthong ba ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du
204b3(nyi khri): las yang dag par 'das te/ thegs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhe
204b4(nyi khri): rje sa ma' lnga skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas sku mched las yang dag par 'ongs te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so/ 
204b5(nyi khri): zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnan/ shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung
204b6(nyi khri): zad med do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad mang ba'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
204b7(nyi khri): min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes mon skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la
204b8(nyi khri): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyang ba'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben/ 
205a1(nyi khri): / sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te/ 
205a2(nyi khri): gnas so// rnam par rtog pa dang / de rnam par dpyod pa nya ba bzhi nas/ nang yongs su dag ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes
205a3(nyi khri): pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nga dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyom su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 
205a4(nyi khri): 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam pa spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba me/ dang pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de bde
205a5(nyi khri): ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms dang dran pas/ 
205a6(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du/ gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs
205a7(nyi khri): kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ namakha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkhal la' la skye mched las yang dag par 'das
205a8(nyi khri): te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung za
205b1(nyi khri): med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnam
205b2(nyi khri): pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med mi skye mched las yang dag par 'as te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrus te sanaso// de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu por
205b3(nyi khri): ngag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzugs pa bzhi dang / sem
205b4(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa
205b5(nyi khri): chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ 'di/ lta ste/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam
205b6(nyi khri): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom
205b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul/ 
205b8(nyi khri): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med
206a1(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
206a2(nyi khri): sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ 
206a3(nyi khri): de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus pas kyi ches gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi ches shes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dpa
206a4(nyi khri): gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan ya nga nge ma yin pa 'dus pas su gtegs pa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
206a5(nyi khri): bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma
206a6(nyi khri): byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig po med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mul zad pa/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa
206a7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid/ chos skyon meng pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes
206a8(nyi khri): bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshang meng pa bzhi dang / 
206b1(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags
206b2(nyi khri): pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
206b3(nyi khri): kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa
206b4(nyi khri): med pas chags par mi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyi su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
206b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
206b6(nyi khri): po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ nga'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol/ 
206b7(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'o sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan
206b8(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / 
207a1(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
207a2(nyi khri): bar dag ste/ rab 'byor du ni sems can gyi phung po chen po ngas pa zhes pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nga lta bu'i phul byeng par 'gyuro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje la
207a3(nyi khri): bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
207a4(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sam ngas bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go bgo bar bya ste/ bdag gis bdog pa thams
207a5(nyi khri): cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sem sa can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bcwa
207a6(nyi khri): bar bya'o// da ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba meng pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag
207a7(nyi khri): gis shes par bya'o// bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro ba phun sum tshogs
207a8(nyi khri): pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab
207b1(nyi khri): 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyeng ba rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing / ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa
207b2(nyi khri): tshul gyis byung ngo // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rngan pa'i sems
207b3(nyi khri): can ji skad cig/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyam su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ de la byang chub sems
207b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya/ ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya
207b5(nyi khri): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o// zhes thabs de lta
207b6(nyi khri): bus sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad
207b7(nyi khri): kyang nyam su myong bar bya'o// de nas gdong bdag gis don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyad nga/ bskal pa be ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar/ byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
207b8(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub
208a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi drang po chen po nges pa'i yul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyu
208a2(nyi khri): 'chang bar rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems brlabs po chang bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ sems
208a3(nyi khri): dang po bskyed phyin chad/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ so so'i spyi ze'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang
208a4(nyi khri): bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o// nges sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po tshangs rlom semasu mi ba'o// rab 'byor
208a5(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba 'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
208a6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la byed cing / des rlom semasu mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba'o// sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul
208a7(nyi khri): gyis 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyuraro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
208a8(nyi khri): chen po'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad la skyob cing / sems
208b1(nyi khri): can thams cad yongs su mi gteng la/ des rlom sem su 'gyur ba meng pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing / sems can
208b2(nyi khri): gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'ber gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// 
208b3(nyi khri): ches la mes par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la
208b4(nyi khri): 'dod cing mes pa ste/ 'di ni ches 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la tshe snga la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos 'dod pa de la dga' zhing mdo na par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la
208b5(nyi khri): chos la mes pa gang zhe na/ gang chos la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
208b6(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
208b7(nyi khri): spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang steng pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po ngas
208b8(nyi khri): pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i/ 
209a1(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
209a2(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzus kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
209a3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/ 
209a4(nyi khri): sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
209a5(nyi khri): spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa' ltar chags pa med pas/ rnam par grolo zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can
209a6(nyi khri): gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar ba'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209a7(nyi khri): la spyod pa sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la
209a8(nyi khri): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spongs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
209b1(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la spongs pa bskyed cig/ shA radwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu blta ba dang / sems can du blta ba dang / sreg tu blta ba dang / gang zag tu blta ba dang / gso
209b2(nyi khri): ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed can dang / shing bdag dang / bad pa po dang / tsher ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por blta ba dang / chang par lta ba dang / rtag par blta ba dang / yod par
209b3(nyi khri): lta ba dang / med par blta ba dang / phung por blta ba dang / khamasu blta ba dang / skye mched du blta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar blta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dag dang / byang chub kyi
209b4(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos su blta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du blta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar blta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar blta
209b5(nyi khri): ba dang / byang chub tu blta ba dang / sangs rgya su blta ba dang / chos su blta ba dang / ngage 'dun du blta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las
209b6(nyi khri): 'da' bar blta ba rab tu spang ba'i skad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// 
209b7(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu blta bar
209b8(nyi khri): 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par rashes par blta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du blta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 
210a1(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis blta ba
210a2(nyi khri): bskyed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis blta ba bskyed de// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar dmigs
210a3(nyi khri): shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis blta ba bsnyad de// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
210a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / sdebs rnams dang / chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
210a5(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis blta ba bskyed do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
210a6(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jig
210a7(nyi khri): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga ba bskyed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
210a8(nyi khri): bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis blto ba bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu blta bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du she
210b1(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par blta bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du blta bar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'as rab kyi pha
210b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
210b3(nyi khri): to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang sbrebs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyed kyis spobs pa bskyed
210b4(nyi khri): cig/ rab 'byer gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thodang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems
210b5(nyi khri): de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byung chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems na
210b6(nyi khri): zag pa ma mchis shing khong du chud da ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang rang bzhin stong pa
210b7(nyi khri): nyid kyi slad du/ chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
210b8(nyi khri): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang
211a1(nyi khri): / ma na pa na 'a'i chu mas mas pa tshan po mas dang na / rnamam #
211a2(nyi khri): rjesu mi mthod / 'gal pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'greng pa dang / 'a ba dang / 'gre ba dang / kunan ma nyin mongs pa dang / rnam par drang ba yang dag par rje mtheng rje/ tshe dang ldan pa shA dwa dwa'i bu
211a3(nyi khri): la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med dring 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gre ba medang pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba rang pa de la nyan thes kyi sems med// rang rangs
211a4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sems med do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa di'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
211a5(nyi khri): chen po'i rims mi mnyam po dang mnyam pa ste/ nyam thong dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa/ che dang ldan pa ba 'bye sang khyod
211a6(nyi khri): skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems/ zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud pa med pa ste/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med do// zhes smras pa ni de lta ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas
211a7(nyi khri): gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o// spros pa/ 
211a8(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / 
211b1(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad
211b2(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyed kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med cing / khengs su chud pa med do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin
211b3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber ngar yang ma zad de/ bris pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa mang ngo // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
211b4(nyi khri): kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi/ rang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa ni/ rang ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa
211b5(nyi khri): radwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin
211b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khengs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa meng ngo // smras pa/ tshe dang
211b7(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'byor de lnga yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa mang ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin
211b8(nyi khri): stong pa'i phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chung ba red ngo // sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang kyi bar yang rang bzhin spong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa mod cing khongs su chung ba medo/ rnam pa
212a1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khengs su chud pa med de// rab 'byer gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin
212a2(nyi khri): te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khengs su chud pa med de// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag
212a3(nyi khri): pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa mang cing khongs su chud pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin
212a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa mang ngo // smras dpa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du sems ma nga pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med do// zhes smras pa
212a5(nyi khri): ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ngar yang ma zad de/ gzugs meng pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tsher ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / 
212a6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnams la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
212a7(nyi khri): ma 'das pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa mang ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la chags
212a8(nyi khri): pa meng ngo // smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa mang ngo // tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam
212b1(nyi khri): par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi legs kyi ches rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa medo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
212b2(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la chags pa mang ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags
212b3(nyi khri): pa med de// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la da ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan
212b4(nyi khri): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yi na pa'i sems nges kyang / chos thams cad la dmigs pa mang ba'i tshul gyis rlom semasu 'gyur ba med/ mngon par chags
212b5(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba med/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po zhes pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ga nga gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
212b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba nga la bdag kyang spongs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa
212b7(nyi khri): bskrad cig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nga ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nga ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la
212b8(nyi khri): de ni thag pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa/ 
213a1(nyi khri): byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bges shes pa/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe
213a2(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi che zhig gi den du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems
213a3(nyi khri): can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims bsrung
213a4(nyi khri): ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims bsrung ngo // sems can nyung zad 'i tshe'i phyir bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
213a5(nyi khri): gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzed pa bsgom// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir brtson
213a6(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus bcom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can nyung
213a7(nyi khri): zang nyi tshe'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan bskyed do// 
213a8(nyi khri): sems can nyung zad 'i che'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes pa
213b1(nyi khri): sgom me// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'angs pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di skad cig ni yengasu
213b2(nyi khri): mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o// zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes/ sems can yongs su dpag pas ge cha mi gyen gyi
213b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyen te// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdog gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems
213b4(nyi khri): can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// dbadag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzo da pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
213b5(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sem sa can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar
213b6(nyi khri): bar bya'o// bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad meng pa rnams dang / gzugs med
213b7(nyi khri): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa
213b8(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ding 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
214a1(nyi khri): pa'i sdebs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so se yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par ba'o// sems can thams cad
214a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nga tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ge cha chen po dges pa
214a3(nyi khri): zhes bya'o// / bar po bcu zhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang
214a4(nyi khri): yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang lnga na pa'i yid la ba ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la babs yongs su gteng ste/ dge ba'i rwa
214a5(nyi khri): ba de yang sems can thams cad dang / thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
214a6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gting ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ge cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
214a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gting zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi steng zhing mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa
214a8(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ge cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
214b1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyidang dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ ches de dag la bzod pa dang / mes pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa
214b2(nyi khri): su gdeng ba'i bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
214b3(nyi khri): pa'i yid la ba bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi dad pa 'di ni ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ge cha
214b4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la babs
214b5(nyi khri): sems rtse cig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'bed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
214b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing / sbyin pa yongs su gdeng ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ge tsa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
214b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar bas pa'i 'du shes
214b8(nyi khri): bar gnas te/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 
215a1(nyi khri): ston pa yongs su gting ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ge cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rarA ti'i du/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
215a2(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la/ mnan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbed pa'i go cha chen po
215a3(nyi khri): dgos par shes par ba'i// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bang chudab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprid cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
215a4(nyi khri): pa'i yid la babs/ gang sbyin pa yongs su gdeng ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun med du byas shing / bla na mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bcwa
215a5(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi na pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA rangadwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
215a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yong mos pa
215a7(nyi khri): bskyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lnga smos kyang ci dgyes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i// tshe dang ldan
215a8(nyi khri): pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed cing chos de dag la bzed pa dang / 
215b1(nyi khri): mes pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
215b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la babs tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
215b3(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
215b4(nyi khri): yid la ba bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'bad cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
215b5(nyi khri): thun med du byas te/ bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
215b6(nyi khri): pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
215b7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ngas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad la sgyu mar bas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing tshul khrims des rlom sems mi
215b8(nyi khri): byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba nga yang sems can thams cad dang thun ming du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
216a1(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
216a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir gi che chen po dgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan po shA ra dwa ti'i bu
216a3(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
216a4(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yod la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba
216a5(nyi khri): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
216a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul
216a7(nyi khri): khrims yongs su bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
216a8(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
216b1(nyi khri): la sbed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bangs chos de dag la bzed pa dang / mes pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
216b2(nyi khri): spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam
216b3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
216b4(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma yin
216b5(nyi khri): gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse cig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
216b6(nyi khri): po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
216b7(nyi khri): yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod
216b8(nyi khri): pa des rlom sem su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
217a1(nyi khri): radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sbed pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir
217a2(nyi khri): go cha chen po dgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
217a3(nyi khri): pa'i yid la ba ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la babs sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun med du byas te/ bla na med pa
217a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
217a5(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ 
217a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
217a7(nyi khri): yongs su bsngo pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
217a8(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 
217b1(nyi khri): chos de dag la de ltar bzed pa dang / mes pa dang rten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
217b2(nyi khri): radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas brtson 'grus
217b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / rtun mi nges pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
217b4(nyi khri): spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub se se de'i chen po 'an thos dang / nga sus dang ldan pa'i yid la bab ma yin gyi rnam pa thaMng mkhyen pa rgyam cid
217b5(nyi khri): sems rtse cig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
217b6(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams
217b7(nyi khri): cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom semasu mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / 
217b8(nyi khri): bla na mang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
218a1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA rarA ti'i dri gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi nga rol du phyin pa la de lngar skyed pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug de thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ 
218a2(nyi khri): de'i phyir go cha chen po dgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gdan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thes dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
218a3(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ngas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge pa'i rtsa ba nga yang sems can thams cad dang thun meng du byas te/ bla na med pa
218a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
218a5(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma yin gyi/ rnam
218a6(nyi khri): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba nga yang sems can thams cad dang thun med du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
218a7(nyi khri): bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
218a8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
218b1(nyi khri): bzod pa yongs su bsgom snga/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun med du byas shing / bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsde ba 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems
218b2(nyi khri): chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
218b3(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nga yang sems
218b4(nyi khri): can thams cad dang thun mong nga byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gdan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
218b5(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 
218b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas sems rtse cig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing
218b7(nyi khri): dge pa'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha
218b8(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos
219a1(nyi khri): thams cad la sgyu mar bas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan de rlom semasu mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams
219a2(nyi khri): cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
219a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gdan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad
219a4(nyi khri): yongs su 'dzin te/ nga'i phyir go cha chen po dgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
219a5(nyi khri): de ltar spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag
219a6(nyi khri): pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dag pa'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun med du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
219a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong
219a8(nyi khri): cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing / dge ba'i
219b1(nyi khri): rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun med du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
219b2(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
219b3(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ngas chos de dag la de ltar bzed pa la mos shing brten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams
219b4(nyi khri): cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
219b5(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bug zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin
