219b6(nyi khri): gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
219b7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
219b8(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
220a1(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ sems rtse cig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun med du byas te/ bla ra rid pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chu
220a2(nyi khri): tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
220a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma yin
220a4(nyi khri): gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sam su mi bad de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang / thun mong du byas
220a5(nyi khri): shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsde ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che nu po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi
220a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang dag dang / sems can dang byang
220a7(nyi khri): chub la mtshan mar mi byed/ tshad mar mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi ge cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
220a8(nyi khri): radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yeng su rdzogs par byed // tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu
220b1(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshang meng pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gsheg ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med
220b2(nyi khri): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi bye // bsam gangan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang mi 'bregs te/ bsam/ 
220b3(nyi khri): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
220b4(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pa dang 'gregs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs meng ba'i snyoms
220b5(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i
220b6(nyi khri): mtha' mngon du yang mi byeng de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
220b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i ge cha chen po dgos te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po dgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
220b8(nyi khri): radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar go cha chen po dgos pa la/ shar phegs dang / lde dang / nub dang / byang dang nga shar dang shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 
221a1(nyi khri): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi be ma snang dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams dang ched du brjed pa ched du
221a2(nyi khri): brjed cing / ming yongs su sgeg par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge me zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ge cha chen po dges pa 'ang lnga bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par 'di// 
221a3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o// zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing / dbangs rjesu sgeg ge/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'
221a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
221a5(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyi na pa drug la spyod/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig de mi dge ba'i ches kyis dben pa/ 
221a6(nyi khri): pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang
221a7(nyi khri): bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldeng pa med pa/ yongasu
221a8(nyi khri): rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rtem ches kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje
221b1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / bdang sems dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs
221b2(nyi khri): pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phigs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mes par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs
221b3(nyi khri): med pa na yod pa 'di dag la na mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhag cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
221b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
221b5(nyi khri): gdan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub se mus dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la yang ngas
221b6(nyi khri): par zhugs pa zhes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bams po dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa
221b7(nyi khri): gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldong po med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rjen chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam kha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu smras pa
221b8(nyi khri): gang hUM/ mos par byas shing rnam par rung ngo // snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dpa' ba dang ldan pa dang / bdang rloms dang ldan pa'i sechos rgya chen po/ shin tu yas pa/ mi gnyis // mang rang
222a1(nyi khri): gcugs mang nga/ gnod pa mang pa/ lteng ba med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rjen ches kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs
222a2(nyi khri): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mes par byas shing rnam par sbed do// de 'dod pas dben pa/ sdig te mi dag pa'i ches kyis dben pa/ rdeg pa dang bcas/ dped pa dang bcas/ dben pa las skyes
222a3(nyi khri): pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gang na gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// na mkha' mtha' yas
222a4(nyi khri): skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad meng ba'i skye mched dang // 'du shes med 'du bas mang min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub seng
222a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu
222a6(nyi khri): spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel pa rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag
222a7(nyi khri): gi ro dang // de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa/ 
222a8(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ bsam gautan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhag cing / rnam par ldang bar yang
222b1(nyi khri): mi blta sde/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi ge mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams
222b2(nyi khri): pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa
222b3(nyi khri): de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems can thams cad kyi nyen mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan te snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mes pa dang / rdeg pa
222b4(nyi khri): dang sems shing khengs du chud par byedade pa 'di ni byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
222b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshang med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa de dag gos rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad
222b6(nyi khri): don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems
222b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog
222b8(nyi khri): cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems
223a1(nyi khri): / dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ bsam gangan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gangan
223a2(nyi khri): gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang
223a3(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa mang ba'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom
223a4(nyi khri): sems med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
223a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du/ byang
223a6(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar
223a7(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma meng pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
223a8(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
223b1(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe
223b2(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su sgrub par bya'o zhes de la gzhal bar bde// 
223b3(nyi khri): snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i sems byed ngo // dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams
223b4(nyi khri): can sgrol bar ba'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// dadang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems ca na rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya bra la rab tu gzhol bar byed cing / 
223b5(nyi khri): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la/ spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam pa nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / 
223b6(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsde ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
223b7(nyi khri): yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
223b8(nyi khri): chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis/ ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
224a1(nyi khri): 'ded pa mi bskyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mes shing dga' ba 'ang ni bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzed pa'i ngal tu phyin
224a2(nyi khri): pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskrad pas/ mi dag pa'i ches rnams rab tu spong ba dang / dge pa'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don
224a3(nyi khri): du/ brtson 'grus mo gtong bas rnam par spong ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i// nam dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
224a4(nyi khri): po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs mang po'i snyam sa par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs mang pa'i snyoms par
224a5(nyi khri): 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub se ma mangs ma 'a bya
224a6(nyi khri): dze me mo mas pa khyes cing stan pa'i ri byas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhag cing / rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa
224a7(nyi khri): rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / steng pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma meng pa'i rnam pa dang / spen pa mang pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos
224a8(nyi khri): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon meng par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu di ni byang chub sems
224b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA dra bo'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i yul gyis ma yi
224b2(nyi khri): pi steng pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po mang ba'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224b3(nyi khri): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing / mnyam pa nyid du
224b4(nyi khri): gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i hUM 'dzi ni dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
224b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag ces bya par shes pa ma 'jug/ mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug ces
224b6(nyi khri): bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen de'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
224b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ dus gsum du shes pa
224b8(nyi khri): 'jug pa med pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thag pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
225a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'deng ba'i kham su shes pa 'jug par mi dang / gzugs dang / gzugs ring ba'i khang su shes pa 'jug par ma nga la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs
225a2(nyi khri): med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di yang nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dang chab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bang
225a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rngan pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ches la yang shes pa 'jug par mi dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus pas dang
225a4(nyi khri): 'dus ma bas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi da kyang / 'jig rnan pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ches mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus pas dang
225a5(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di yang ngas mi dmigs pa'i tshul du dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i// smras
225a6(nyi khri): pa che dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes pa/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di la bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
225a7(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa'
225a8(nyi khri): yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
225b1(nyi khri): par gnas zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
225b2(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / nges dag pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs / mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus pas dang / 'du
225b3(nyi khri): ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i ches kyang mi dmigs shing / shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs
225b4(nyi khri): yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan
225b5(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma 'das pas/ sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de dmigs pa
225b6(nyi khri): tshul gyis nang steng pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bab ma 'dras pas/ sgom pa rnam par skem pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom// 
225b7(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba ma 'das pas/ skem pa rnam par skem pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ pi nang stong pa nyid bsgomo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
225b8(nyi khri): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ skem pa rnam par skem pa'i don du nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangag
226a1(nyi khri): chen ba rnam pa thams sad mkhyen pa zhing dang ldan pa'i yong la 'angam 'dres pas/ skem pa rnam par snyem pa'i dzin du/ de ma rigs pa'i tshul gyis pang chu kyi mas
226a2(nyi khri): rnams paskem mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba 'am 'dres pas/ skem pa dam par skes pa'i den du mi darigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dags pa'i badzin pa rnams dang / bsam gangan rnam
226a3(nyi khri): dang / tshang dang pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / sbeng pa'ing dang / mtshan ma med
226a4(nyi khri): dang smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin sgo ma// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon
226a5(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom// rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid dang lnga na pa'i yid la ba ba ma 'das pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
226a6(nyi khri): ba'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzegs pa bzhi dang / se so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom// 
226a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
226a8(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmig su meng ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di na tha snyad tsam du zad de// zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ 
226b1(nyi khri): zug pa dzan rdzo ma dung //  nga / du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pas shes pa mi gsu me pa 'byor/ rnam par shes pa mes byapa ni mo ma dus
226b2(nyi khri): khamaso / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba tshig su med po'i phyir/ rjen cing 'brel bar 'thung ba zhes bya ba 'di ming tsam du nga ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rogasu mang pa'i phying/ sbyin pa
226b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ngadren 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gangan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang
226b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de/ nang steng pa nyid dmigasu mang ba'i phyir/ nang sdeng pa nyid ces pa
226b5(nyi khri): 'di ni ming tsam du zad // pheM steng pa nyid dmigs meng pa'i phyir/ pi steng pa nyid ces pa ba 'din mong tsam du zad do// phyi na steng pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir/ pi nang steng pa nyid ces bya
226b6(nyi khri): 'di ni ming tsam du zad de// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su meng ba'i phar/ dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi legs kyi ches
226b7(nyi khri): rnams dmigasumeng pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi legs kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
226b8(nyi khri): pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par she
227a1(nyi khri): pa rnam dang / ting 'dzim mas dang / gzus kyi sernams dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa'i rnapas bsrung/ tshe 'dzegs pa pazhi dang / ches 'ang dag pa rig pa baming
227a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ srangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bce rgyang sas papa 'din mong tsam du zang ngo // de bzhin nying dmigasu meng pa'i pir/ de bzhin ming ces pa pa dzim
227a3(nyi khri): ming tsam du zad de// ma ner pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ches nyid dang / ches kyi dbyings nyid dang / ches kyi gnas nyid dang / ches skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
227a4(nyi khri): dmig su meng ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'ang ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces pa ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de// sangs rgyas dmigasumad
227a5(nyi khri): ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad // zhes pa bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa Ni bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
227a6(nyi khri): chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA rang ngo'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ mngon par shes
227a7(nyi khri): pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byeng // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mched pa dang / rim gre ba pa'i tshul gang la gang nges pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bco
227a8(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams la rim grer ba ba dang / bkur stor bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi nang du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga dag las kyang
227b1(nyi khri): lnga ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'ang nyid kyi chos nyan te// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi ning nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs
227b2(nyi khri): kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'thung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'thung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kya
227b3(nyi khri): 'drung de// de gnyi su med pa'i sprul gas shing / lus ji la bris sems can rnams kyi na bya ba'i mthu yid pa de lta bu'i lus ched du ngasams shing yongs su 'dzin to// denas rnam pa thams ca pa
227b4(nyi khri): sa rdzu la ngas pasa' las ma bas nga/ sa dpa brgyas
227b5(nyi khri): / rlung / ma /  nga/ lham yonapa mamanga' nga/ ma la tshang/ da / ma tsham tshas
227b6(nyi khri): ma sa pa tshas kyil kho du // de sa med pa ngas pa mas pa rdzu smras rgya sA/ gas la ts+tshal
227b7(nyi khri): bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjed pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams cha ga me zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na
227b8(nyi khri): ring ba'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog le gnas pa 'di zhes bya bzhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing babaste/ rnam pa thas ci ma khyen pa zhing thabs kyang chos kyi 'khor la bzhir ba byung ma
228a1(nyi khri): grags pa sgeg cing / dbyangs su brjed par mdzad de// lde dang / nub dang / bang dang / byang shar dang / shar lde dang / lde nub dang / nub bang dang / reg dang / steng gi rigs kyi
228a2(nyi khri): phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snying dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yin ngan brjed par mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams tshig re zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems
228a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po thag pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes pa ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid theb ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor le bskor bar bde zhes
228a4(nyi khri): grags pa sgeg cing dbyangs su brjed par mdzad/ de ltar tshe dang lnga na pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes pa'o// de nas che
228a5(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'ber gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das gi cha chen po dges so/ go cha chen po bgos sems bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das ji ma gyis
228a6(nyi khri): ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go che chen po dges zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rab 'phe
228a7(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i ge cha gyen cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ge cha dgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
228a8(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ge chang dges/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ge cha dgis/ pi steng pa nyid kyi ge mang gas/ dngos
228b1(nyi khri): pe mang ba'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar gyi ge chang gis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ge cha dges/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / sdebs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam
228b2(nyi khri): gyi ge cha dgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad meng pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang
228b3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / se se yang
228b4(nyi khri): dam par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bse rgyad kyi gi cha ges/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gi cha po/ sa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gi cha bgos nas/ steng gsum gyi sdeng man
228b5(nyi khri): de'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bgang ste/ legs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bang+gA'i klung gi byem snye snang bas rgyas par 'gangs so// lde phyogs dang / rlung rigs dang / nga bye
228b6(nyi khri): dang bang shar dang / shar lde dang / lde nub dang / nub pang dang / reg dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs rer zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong gsum gyi
228b7(nyi khri): steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed de// shar rigs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi be ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed de// lnga phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / @
228b8(nyi khri): phyogs dang / byang shing dang / shar lho dang / lde 'ub dang // nung byung dang / 'og dang / gleng gi phyogs kyi gis re re zhing 'jis chen gyi khams gang+gA klung gi khyim snang rna pa drug tu rab tu bskyed ngo // ji rdzo
229a1(nyi khri): gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmal ba'i me'i phung po dza skad cig yeng ba nga dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
229a2(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjed de// dbangs sgrog/ de'i tshe sems can dumal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra ngo thos nas/ dga' ba dang bang ba 'theb ste/ de dag dga'
229a3(nyi khri): ba dang / bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dumal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing
229a4(nyi khri): 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// de bzhin du bol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gang shin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag bye la seng ge skye gnas dang
229a5(nyi khri): ga shin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams shing 'tshe skyong ba dang de dag tu skye'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ 
229a6(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye ba mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / bel song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
229a7(nyi khri): 'jig rten dag sten tsang mngon par sprul la de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan seng gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgregs par gyur te/ de nas sprul pa dag sangs rgyas
229a8(nyi khri): kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra nges sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / ga shin rje'i 'jig rten ngag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'bar de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma
229b1(nyi khri): mkhan pa 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang sems can dmal ba dang / bel seng gi skye gnas dang / ga shin rje'i 'jig rten de nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
229b2(nyi khri): de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum
229b3(nyi khri): las yongs su bkrol yang / sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa meng ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ 
229b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor da ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga cha chen po dgos shes pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gi cha chen po dgos pa ni/ sbyin
229b5(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chenazi 'i 'jig rten gyi khams de DUR+Ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul par byed do// de ltar bai DUR+Ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 
229b6(nyi khri): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul par byed do// dri ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// skem 'dod pa rnams la skom// bzhon
229b7(nyi khri): pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhin pa/ shes 'dod po rnams lo gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spros/ drug pa 'dod pa rnams la drug pa/ mal
229b8(nyi khri): cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/ mi'i yo bang 'dod pa rnams la mi'i ye byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la rkyen rtsi dang yo
230a1(nyi khri): byad kyi ston pa byed de// ne bung / chu tshig dang / ben+d+ha d+ha dang / rung dang / man shel dang / bi dang / gse nga/ dbul de pa 'as la/ nor gung/ 
230a2(nyi khri): dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / mam shel dang / bI ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa bye'o// des de ltar zas 'ded pa rnams la zas sbyin/ mi
230a3(nyi khri): yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis ches ston te// sems can de dag gis kyang ches bstan pa nga thos nas/ 
230a4(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur re/ rab 'ber 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa 'am/ sgyu ma'i
230a5(nyi khri): mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhigo gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdo 'dug de/ spyi bo mang po'i tshigs kyi mdun du/ skye bai mang po'i tshigs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnam
230a6(nyi khri): la ni zas sbyin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la dzA snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i mtshan bu ngas sems can gang la yang ci la yang byin pa
230a7(nyi khri): yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los bsgyur ba'i tshul
230a8(nyi khri): srong mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo bad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byon yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyi zhen/ rab 'byor rini sgyu ma'i chis
230b1(nyi khri): nyid nye bar bzung na/ ches rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'bor nga lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po dges pa zhes pa'o// rab 'aper gzhan yang byang chub sems
230b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing cheng du bsams te/ skye bo yongasu bzung bas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigasu skye zhing / nges 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas
230b3(nyi khri): sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub
230b4(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mang pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa
230b5(nyi khri): bden pa bzhi dang / ding 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
230b6(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god da / sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang / nam yang
230b7(nyi khri): bral bar mi 'gyuraro// rab 'bor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug te/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang por
230b8(nyi khri): tshegs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bged na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i maban
231a1(nyi khri): po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i bcan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang dge pa bcu'i las kyi lam la bkrod pa yong dang / sangs rdzas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco
231a2(nyi khri): kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni pa mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad red grangs med
231a3(nyi khri): bdage ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod do// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa mdo// rab 'ber de tse'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i
231a4(nyi khri): chos nyid nye bar bzung nas/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin ni nga yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa 'asems dpa' chen po go mchen po dgos pa zhes bya'o// 
231a5(nyi khri): ba po bco lnga pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems da ba' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
231a6(nyi khri): sbyor zhing rab tu 'bod do// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing / 
231a7(nyi khri): rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung te/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang dbyig/ pus brdeg
231a8(nyi khri): cing mngon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrugs pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mo bzhes somagyon cing / sems can bams cad kyang bzeng bde 'dra ba la rab tu 'gong / 
231b1(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sbu ba'i mkhan pa'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan pa mkhas pa zhig gis lam be che'i bzhi mdor skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te
231b2(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba dang / rab tu 'god pa byas na/ rab 'byur de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhar po'i mtshar bu ngas/ sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol
231b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
231b4(nyi khri): can tshad med/ gangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ba kod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha re la tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bor de ni
231b5(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi sa de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu 'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po
231b6(nyi khri): bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan pos brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha
231b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskol zhing gzhog go// 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 
231b8(nyi khri): sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskal pa dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
232a1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyer pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems ca thams cad lus pa sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bsku pa'i shege yong ngo // rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ dab sa
232a2(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan pa 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lom po che'i bzhi mder 'dug ste/ skye bo mang de'i tshigs kyi mdun du/ skye bo ring po'i tshigs zhig mngon par sprul de/ lus dang
232a3(nyi khri): sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byer de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi 'dren 'grus la bged pa yod
232a4(nyi khri): ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhi na du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can
232a5(nyi khri): tshad meng grangs mang pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byer nga ni sgyu ma'i cha sa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ ches rnams kyi ches nyid kyis de bzhin nga
232a6(nyi khri): yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'ber de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes pa'o// rab 'ber gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gdan gyi
232a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskal zhing gzhag gi/ 
232a8(nyi khri): 'gong ngo do// rab 'byer ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul pa
232b1(nyi khri): dang / gzhig cing 'ged pa yin ne na/ rab 'ber 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches thams cad kyi ches nyid la gnas shing / ches gang la yang 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med
232b2(nyi khri): par yang dag par rjes po mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ rang bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skal zhing gzheg pa
232b3(nyi khri): dang 'ged par byed da/ da ltar yang dag par bskal pa rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pa
232b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan pa 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtsha na du mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mder 'dug ste/ skye
232b5(nyi khri): mang po'i tshigs kyi mdun du skye be mang po'i tshigs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi po rol tu phyin pa la ba keng na/ rab 'ber nga la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa
232b6(nyi khri): 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu ngas sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
232b7(nyi khri): pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkeng kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
232b8(nyi khri): bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byer nga ni sgra ma'i ches zhing zhi bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi ches nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byer nga lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
233a1(nyi khri): chen po ni go che chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can
233a2(nyi khri): thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing / gzhog ge/ 'geng ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
233a3(nyi khri): shing sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
233a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor da ltar
233a5(nyi khri): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ra la tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems na thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
233a6(nyi khri): bor bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i chags
233a7(nyi khri): kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon por sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te/ bzhag cing bkod na/ rab 'bor nga la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa
233a8(nyi khri): 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu ngas sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
233b1(nyi khri): ba 'bor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shesarab kyi rol tu phyin pa la bgeng / sems pacan gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bged ba me / 
233b2(nyi khri): deci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'dir nga ni sgyu ma'i ches zhing nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi ches nyid kyis de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go che chen po dgos pa
233b3(nyi khri): zhes pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ge cha chen po bges shing shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed ngag tu seng zhing ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i ngarol
233b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams nga dag na sam sa can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gnog go// 'god do// 
233b5(nyi khri): ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa/ 'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
233b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji skad cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhig/ 'ge/ 
233b7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang sten to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar
233b8(nyi khri): du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro// lha dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs
234a1(nyi khri): kyi legs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byem snang dag tu seng zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
234a2(nyi khri): bar la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhag/ 'ged de// de bzhin du tshul
234a3(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / badzin 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul na
234a4(nyi khri): gzhag go// 'god ngo do// 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang sten to// sems can de dag kyang ches nga the sa nas bla na mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
234a5(nyi khri): sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'ber 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa 'am/ sgyu ma'i rakhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig
234a6(nyi khri): gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul ta pa ral tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bsgril zhing gnag sde bkod par gyur na/ ra
234a7(nyi khri): 'byor nga ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu ngas sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhag te bged pa yeng ngam/ gsel ba
234a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das nga ni ma mchis so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byeb de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar legs kyi 'dzag rten gyi khams pad+ma'i klung gi ma
234b1(nyi khri): snyeng dang lho dang nub dang / dang dang / bang shar dang / shar lde dang / lde nub dang / nub bang dang / reg dang sdang gi legs kyi phigs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang
234b2(nyi khri): ji skad yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bor sgyu ma'i chos nyid zhi bar bzung na/ chos
234b3(nyi khri): rnams kyi ches nyid kyis de bzhin nyid yin pa'i par te/ rab 'ber da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ge cha chen po dgos pa zhes pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
234b4(nyi khri): chen po ge cha chen po dges pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'od dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par sbed cing / sems bskrad pa gnan gyis ge mo 'byed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di skad cig ni
234b5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'ged par bya'o// 'di skad cig ni 'ged par mi ba'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cog ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol
234b6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni 'ged par mi bya'o// bdag gis ren
234b7(nyi khri): 'di snyed cig ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum su bdun pa dged par ba'o// 'di snang cig ning mod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco rgya
234b8(nyi khri): bar la dged par bya'o// 'di rnying cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di srid cig ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni 'beng bar mi bya'o// bdag gis sems
235a1(nyi khri): can 'di snyed cig ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / pir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dged par bya'o// 'ang skadang cig na dgeng par mi ba'o// bdag gi
235a2(nyi khri): sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ rang byang chub la dged par ba'o// 'di sred cig na dgod par ma pa'i// bdag gis sems can 'di srid cig na rnam pa thams cad malen pa 'di la 'ged par bya'o// 'ong snyeng cig
235a3(nyi khri): dgod par mi ba'i zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i ge mi 'dod kyi/ de'ang snyam du sems te bdag gis sems cam tshang mang grangs med dpag tu meng pa sbyir pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dged par ba'o// bdag gis sem
235a4(nyi khri): tshad med grangs med pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du
235a5(nyi khri): phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phi stong pa nyid la dged par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa 'dadi la nga gong par bya'o// dngos po mang pa'i nge ba tsang steng pa nyid kyi ngar du
235a6(nyi khri): dgod par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dged par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa
235a7(nyi khri): bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
235a8(nyi khri): pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
235b1(nyi khri): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dged par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
235b2(nyi khri): la dged par bya'o// rang bang chub la dged par ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'ged par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskrad par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste par na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i
235b3(nyi khri): mkhan po'i mtshan du mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dag snga/ skye bo mang po'i tshigs kyi mdun du/ skra be mang po'i tshigs shig mngon par sprul te/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs
235b4(nyi khri): med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'bed par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o snyam du sem sa bskyed par gyur na/ rab 'ber nga la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu
235b5(nyi khri): ma'i mkhan pa 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan po ngas/ sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod por ba pa yeng ngam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'od kyi bar la dathong bar ba ba ma
235b6(nyi khri): ngam gsil ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'a'i 'byer de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems sa tshad de dgras me pa
235b7(nyi khri): du phyin pa dug dang / rnam pa thams car ma ldan pa'i kyi pa la god par sems daskye pa 'i sems can pang giden du lang rims skyed pa med de/ deci'i phyi zhen/ ra
235b8(nyi khri): 'angan/ tshis rnams kyi ches mang kyis de badzin ming yin par phyir /  'byer lngar/ du sems da' sa sapapa chen mo sa chen po thos pa'i byar/ mkhri
236a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rang gi mtshan nyid sbeng pa nyid kyi slad du/ ge cham
236a2(nyi khri): mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bya'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis steng ngo // tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam
236a3(nyi khri): par shes pas steng ngo // mig mig gis sbeng ngo // de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyis steng ngo // gzugs gzugs kyis steng ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / re dang / reg pa
236a4(nyi khri): chos chos kyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pas steng ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
236a5(nyi khri): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas steng mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas ste // rnab
236a6(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lha'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te rag pas steng // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ 
236a7(nyi khri): tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stongango // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus
236a8(nyi khri): kyi 'du te ras pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong // sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // 
236b1(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha
236b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pas stong // nang stong pa nyid rang steng pa nyid kyis steng ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis sdong ngo // byang chub kyi legs kyi chos sum cur
236b3(nyi khri): bdun byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches sum cu rtsa bdun rnams kyis steng ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
236b4(nyi khri): dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma meng pa dang / smin pa mang ba dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
236b5(nyi khri): gzus kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma/ 
236b6(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams kyis steng ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong / go cha chen po yang go cha chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs ngas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
236b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
236b8(nyi khri): rab 'byor nga ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma bas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang
237a1(nyi khri): ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par mthus so// masol pa/ bcom ldan 'as ci'i slang dum pa thams cad ma khyen pa zhing ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mdzin pa ma sa
237a2(nyi khri): pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi den du gyi cha bges pa'i sems can de dag kyang ci'i slad dum bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
237a3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byeng pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par mangs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi
237a4(nyi khri): don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'a byer 'di ltar gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par
237a5(nyi khri): mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnapar shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed // rab 'byer mig mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi
237a6(nyi khri): byeng ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi bye // rab 'byor gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byeng / mngon par mi do // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dpa
237a7(nyi khri): reg dang / chos mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi bye // rab 'byor migi rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi bye // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang
237a8(nyi khri): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon
237b1(nyi khri): par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab
237b2(nyi khri): 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
237b3(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byad/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par ma bying ngo // rab 'byor bdag ni mi byed rnam par mi byed/ mngon
237b4(nyi khri): par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sems can ni mi byed/ rnam par mi bya da/ mngon par mi byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi rig/ 
237b5(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro// gso bo dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / dacan dang / shing bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor bo dang / shes po po dang / mthong ba po mi byed/ rnam par
237b6(nyi khri): byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rmi lam ni mi byeng / rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir
237b7(nyi khri): ro// sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sdig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de// de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sbyo
237b8(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
238a1(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi bang / rnam par mi ded/ mngon par mi byed de/ 
238a2(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir re// rab 'aper nang steng pa nyid ni mi bad/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed // rab 'ber dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar du ni mi bang / 
238a3(nyi khri): rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byede/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'ber byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi bing / rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phar na
238a4(nyi khri): na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i bdun pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs meng pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar
238a5(nyi khri): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa meng pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
238a6(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin
238a7(nyi khri): tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi bde/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
238a8(nyi khri): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khab pa'i dngangs ni mi byed/ rnam par
238b1(nyi khri): mi byed/ mngon par mi byeng de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir re// rab 'byer byang chub ni mi bad/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du mi dmigs
238b2(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'ber rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byeng rnam par mi bang / mngon par mo bing / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byer rnam grangs ngas na/ 'di lngar rnam pa
238b3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam pas rnam par ma bas/ mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi den du ge cha chen po bges pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma bas/ rnam
238b4(nyi khri): par ma bas/ mngon par ma bas par rig par bya'o// rab 'ber de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ ge cha mang pa'i ge cha chen po bges
238b5(nyi khri): pa zhes pa'o// gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshor ba dang
238b6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// nga nas tshe dang ldan pa bams gang gis bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ni/ 
238b7(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po
238b8(nyi khri): gzugs ni ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byang dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang nges smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer da ltar ma bcings ma grol
239a1(nyi khri): ba'i gzugs gang yin/ de ltar nam bcings ma grel ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po
239a2(nyi khri): gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma grel ba'o// gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i cher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nga ni ma bcings ma grel ba'o// gang 'di sgyum
239a3(nyi khri): lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yer lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig rgya lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs nga ni ma bcings ma grel ba'o// gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i tsher ba dang
239a4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byang dang / sprul pa lta bu'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grel ba'i// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'das pa'i che
239a5(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang be ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs nim bcings ma grel ba'i'o// ma 'ongs pa'i
239a6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grel ba'i// da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang
239a7(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byang dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'i// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa gzugs meng pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du
239a8(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa meng pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma btsongs ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings
239b1(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// che rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i pir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir
239b2(nyi khri): gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// cher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dag pa
239b3(nyi khri): gzugs nam bsings ma grol ba'o// dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byad dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po mi dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol
239b4(nyi khri): ba'o// mi dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam por shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dang ldan pa gang po lung du ma dustan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grel
239b5(nyi khri): ba'o// lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten pa'i gzugs nim bcings ma grol
239b6(nyi khri): ba'o// 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 
239b7(nyi khri): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ 
239b8(nyi khri): zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa med pa'i gzugs nim bcings ma grol ba'o// 
240a1(nyi khri): zag pa med pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i phyir
240a2(nyi khri): gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa meng pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grel ba'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings
240a3(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam por shes pa dben pa'i phar/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol
240a4(nyi khri): ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bci ngas ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma
240a5(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba ste/ med pa'i phyir ma btsongs ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyi ram bcings ma grel ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha
240a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
240a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po mang pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyi ma bcos ma grel ba'o// ma skyes pa
240a8(nyi khri): phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
240b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grel ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang steng pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol
240b2(nyi khri): ba'o// pi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// pi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/ 
240b3(nyi khri): nang steng pa nyid ma bcings ma grel ba'o// dben pa'i pir ma bcings ma grol ba'i// ma skyes pa'i pir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir pi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings
240b4(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// meng pa'i phyir phi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sa rgyam ma ma chu na ma nga ma da
240b5(nyi khri): 'dro dris rnye pabyas mthos tshe dang ldan pa gang po ngang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po meng pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
240b6(nyi khri): rtsa bdun ma bcings ma grol ba'i// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar dang / mi 'jigs
241a1(nyi khri): gang po mang ba'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grel pa'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grel ba'i// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshe dang ldan
241a2(nyi khri): pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcings ma grel ba'i// tshe dang ldan pa gang po mang ba'i phyir/ ma bcings ma grel ba'o// dngan pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grel ba'i// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grel ba'i// che
241a3(nyi khri): ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grel ba'o// ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / ches kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / ches skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
241a4(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po mang pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ma bcings mgrel ba'i// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'i// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings sa
241a5(nyi khri): grol ba'o// mang pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ma bcings mgre la ba'i// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grel ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa mang po 'dus ma
241a6(nyi khri): byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grel pa ste/ dngan pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa
241a7(nyi khri): gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma bcings ma grol ba zhes bya ba'i ches kyi sgo sde/ de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grel ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
241a8(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtso 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcis mgrel ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba
241b1(nyi khri): du ma bcings ma grol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'i// sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grel ba'o// de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grel ba'i// ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
241b2(nyi khri): chos nying dang / chos kyi dngas dang / ches kyi gnas shing dang / ches skyon pa med pa'id dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grel ba'o// 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grel ba'i// de ma brjings ma grel ba'i sbyin pa'i
241b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
241b4(nyi khri): la gnas/ ma bcings mgrel ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas ma bcings ma grol ba'i mchod pa de bzhin nyid dang / ma btsangs
241b5(nyi khri): grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nying dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings dang ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi gnas nying dang / ma bcings ma
241b6(nyi khri): grol ba'i chos skyon meng pa dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma bas la gnas te/ ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su
241b7(nyi khri): smin par byed// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bye'o// 
242a1(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bsings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 
242a2(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzung sa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grel pa de ma bcings ma grel ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma
242a3(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba dam bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub par 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba nga ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
242a4(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba dam bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyuraro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'ged
242a5(nyi khri): par 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma bcings ma grol bas/ mang pa dang dben pa dang / skye
242a6(nyi khri): ba med pa nye bar bzung zhing / chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi bcings ma grol ba theg pa chen po'i ge cha dgos par rig par
242a7(nyi khri): bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
242a8(nyi khri): rngo tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba lags/ theg pa de ni gang nas byung ba lags/ theb pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur
242b1(nyi khri): ba lags/ theg pa des ni su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byer gang khyed nga skad du byang chub sangs
242b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po gang zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/ drug gang zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
242b3(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab
242b4(nyi khri): 'byer 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas don du gnyer ba rnams la phi nang gi dngos po'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ 
242b5(nyi khri): de yang sems can thams cad dang thun med du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
242b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom
242b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
242b8(nyi khri): yang dag par blangs shing gnas la/ sems can pha rol kyang dag pa bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu 'god pa 'di ni byang chub
243a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ 
243a2(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskrad
243a3(nyi khri): pas/ bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin la/ gzhan yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa la yang dag par bskul ba 'di ni/ ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
243a4(nyi khri): pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
243a5(nyi khri): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag tu nga pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa mi 'dir zhing / gzhan yang
243a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
